TopicTitle: Now i need to EVA kerbonauts before launch or...

Articles.Content:
... i'll always launch with a full crew compliment ?

Is this a consequence of the new "no need for a command pod" thing ?

Edited June 1, 2013 by Mokmo
Why not just launch up the crew to jool, drop them in on 4x phys warp. It will totally work out. But no, this was added in .20 but im not entirely sure why.
Ok, i guess i'll check out the Crew Manifest mod then...
